item.title: 吉姆-卡伦谈市场大跌和美联储的历史性调整
item.description:
本周为何如此关键？【原文：

Why this week ended up being so pivotal.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：吉姆-卡隆谈美联储的历史性调整（播客）
item.description: 周三，美联储如期降息 25 个基点。但美联储同时上调了 2025 年的通胀预期，并认为明年只需再降息两次。市场对此反应激烈，主要指标创下了长期以来最糟糕的一天。此外，市场无处可躲。除了股票，债券和黄金也遭到抛售。现在是什么情况？这对投资组合的构建意味着什么？在本期节目中，我们将采访首席投资官吉姆-卡隆（Jim Caron）。【原文：On Wednesday, the Federal Reserve cut interest rates by 25 basis points as expected. But it also raised its inflation outlook for 2025, and sees just two more cuts next year. The markets reacted violently to it, with the major measures posting their worst day in a long time. What’s more, there was nowhere to hide. Bonds and gold also sold off, alongside equities. So what’s going on now? And what does this mean for portfolio construction? On this episode, we speak with Jim Caron, chief investment】

item.title: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元基金首席执行官透露播客工作的好处
item.description: 挪威 1.8 万亿美元主权财富基金的负责人尼古拉-坦根（Nicolai Tangen）说，他作为播客主持人的副业促进了求职申请，打开了企业大门，并让员工考虑在中午小睡一会儿。【原文：The head of Norway’s $1.8 trillion sovereign wealth fund, Nicolai Tangen, said his side gig as podcast host is boosting job applications, opening corporate doors and getting employees to consider a mid-day nap.】

item.title: Prosus 主席信托基金为酒店发展出售 1.56 亿欧元股票
item.description: 一个与南非最富有的人之一科斯-贝克尔（Koos Bekker —）有关的家族信托基金出售了互联网投资巨头 Prosus NV 大约 1.56 亿欧元的股份，用于资助南非、英国和意大利酒店的建设运营。【原文：A family trust linked to Koos Bekker — one of South Africa’s richest people — sold about €156 million of shares in internet investing giant Prosus NV to fund building operations at hotels in South Africa, the UK and Italy.】

item.title: 南非批准开放铁路网络使用的蓝图
item.description: 南非批准了向私营运营商开放全国庞大铁路网络的蓝图。【原文：South Africa approved a blueprint for opening access to the nation’s vast rail network to private operators.】

item.title: 斯洛伐克可能就天然气过境问题对乌克兰采取措施
item.description: 如果乌克兰不允许从俄罗斯向欧洲输送天然气，斯洛伐克可能会考虑对乌克兰采取对等措施。【原文：Slovakia may consider reciprocal measures against Ukraine if it doesn’t allow the transit of gas from Russia to Europe.】

item.title: 扭亏为盈赢得债券投资者青睐，Eskom 风险溢价下降
item.description: 随着南非国有电力公司扭亏为盈的势头日渐强劲，Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd. 的风险溢价也在下降。【原文：Eskom Holdings SOC Ltd.’s risk premium is dwindling as a turnaround at South Africa’s state-owned electricity company gathers momentum.】

item.title: 印度议会结束以抗议和争吵为标志的混乱会议
item.description: 印度议会结束了一年多来最没有成果的一次会议，议员之间的争吵和反对派要求对总理纳伦德拉-莫迪的盟友、亿万富翁商人高塔姆-阿达尼（Gautam Adani）进行调查的呼声使会议蒙上了阴影。【原文：India’s Parliament concluded its least productive session in more than a year, marred by brawls between lawmakers and opposition calls for investigations into Gautam Adani, the billionaire businessman and ally of Prime Minister Narendra Modi.】

item.title: 铜业策略转变，撤回英国加密货币授权申请
item.description: 加密货币托管机构 Copper Technologies Ltd. 周五撤回了在英国金融监管机构注册的申请，并表示将在新任首席执行官的领导下将重点转向海外中心。【原文：Crypto custodian Copper Technologies Ltd. withdrew its application to register with the UK’s financial regulator on Friday, saying it will shift to focus on overseas hubs under its new chief executive officer.】

item.title: 欧洲股市将出现 9 月以来最大单周跌幅
item.description: 欧洲股市连续第二天下滑，使基准指数创下三个多月来的最大单周跌幅，原因是投资者担心美国利率前景更加鹰派。【原文：European stocks slid for a second day, putting the benchmark gauge on course for its biggest weekly decline in more than three months, as investors braced for a more hawkish outlook for US interest rates.】

item.title: 马来西亚检察官质疑无罪释放纳吉布-拉扎克的妻子
item.description: 马来西亚检方对法院宣判前总理纳吉布-拉扎克（Najib Razak）的妻子罗斯玛-曼苏尔（Rosmah Mansor）洗钱和逃税罪名不成立提出上诉。【原文：Malaysian prosecutors filed an appeal against a court decision acquitting Rosmah Mansor, the wife of former Prime Minister Najib Razak, of money laundering and tax evasion charges.】

item.title: 英国首席执行官们认为人工智能、住房和太空矿山是 2025 年的几大主题
item.description: 2024 年是繁忙的一年：唐纳德-特朗普再次当选，利率下降，地缘政治紧张局势加剧。在新的一年即将到来之际，彭博新闻社采访了十几位英国首席执行官，请他们谈谈 2025 年需要注意的事项。来自金融、建筑和能源等多个行业的老板们发表了自己的见解，以下是英国公司的关键主题。【原文：It’s been a busy 2024: Donald Trump got elected again, interest rates eased and geopolitical tensions intensified. As the new year approaches, Bloomberg News spoke to a dozen British chief executive officers about what to look out for in 2025. With insights from bosses from a range of sectors including finance, construction and energy, here are the key themes for UK Plc.】

item.title: 中国对美电池出口跃升至创纪录的 19 亿美元
item.description: 中国对美国的锂离子电池出口量在上个月飙升至创纪录水平，原因是各公司赶在美国政府取消税收优惠之前出货。【原文：China’s exports of lithium-ion batteries to the US spiked to a record last month as companies raced to ship products before the government removed tax benefits.】

item.title: 美国银行、野村因上田鸽派而推迟日本央行加息
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）在周四的货币政策发布会上表达了谨慎的基调，两家主要金融公司的经济学家将日本央行下一次加息的预期从1月份推迟到了2025年3月份。【原文：Economists at two major financial firms pushed out expectations for the Bank of Japan’s next interest rate hike to March 2025 from January after Governor Kazuo Ueda struck a cautious tone in his monetary policy briefing Thursday.】

item.title: 债务成本下降，英国预算赤字低于预期
item.description: 由于财政部受益于债务利息支出的大幅下降，11 月份英国政府借贷下降。【原文：UK government borrowing fell in November as the Treasury benefitted from a sharp fall in debt-interest payments.】

item.title: 英国零售销售增幅低于预期 消费者态度谨慎
item.description: 英国 11 月份的零售销售增长速度低于预期，原因是工党政府的首份预算案出台后，生活成本压力影响了消费者的情绪。【原文：UK retail sales grew more slowly than expected in November as cost-of-living pressures weighed on consumer sentiment in the wake of the Labour government’s first budget.】

item.title: 马来西亚接受海洋无限公司关于搜索 MH370 航班的建议
item.description: 马来西亚交通部长安东尼-陆（Anthony Loke）表示，马来西亚在接受海洋无限公司（Ocean Infinity）搜寻马航 370 航班残骸的建议后，正在与该公司就条款和条件进行谈判。【原文：Malaysia is negotiating terms and conditions with Ocean Infinity after accepting its proposal to search for the wreckage of Malaysia Airlines Flight 370, according to Transport Minister Anthony Loke.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英镑触及五月以来最低水平
腾讯与荣耀就人工智能和云计算达成广泛合作
item.description: 腾讯控股有限公司周五发表声明称，将与荣耀设备有限公司在云和人工智能开发方面开展长期战略合作。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. and Honor Device Co. will engage in a long-term strategic cooperation on cloud and artificial intelligence development, according to a statement on Friday.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁欧盟若不购买更多美国石油和天然气将征收关税
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普威胁欧盟，如果欧盟成员国不购买更多的美国石油和天然气，他将对欧盟征收关税。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump has threatened the European Union with tariffs if its member countries don’t buy more American oil and gas.】

item.title: 澳大利亚交易所称正在调查结算问题
item.description: 澳大利亚证券交易所有限公司（ASX Ltd. ）表示，正在调查周五下午导致部分客户交易延迟的结算平台问题。【原文：ASX Ltd. said it’s investigating a problem with its settlement platform that caused a delay for some customers on Friday afternoon.】

item.title: 英国航空所有者 IAG 度过航空股艰难的一年
item.description: 对于欧洲航空业的投资者来说，今年是艰难的一年，波音公司的生产困境、发动机问题导致飞机停飞以及仍然低迷的企业旅游市场都对该行业造成了压力。【原文：It’s been a tough year for investors in European aviation, with Boeing Co.’s production woes, engine problems grounding aircraft and the still-sluggish corporate-travel market weighing on the sector.】

item.title: 梅洛尼时代正在解除意大利市场永远充满疑虑的魔咒
item.description: 乔治亚-梅洛尼一直在努力实现她的前任意大利总理们长期以来一直在努力实现的壮举：赢得越来越多投资者的信任。【原文：Giorgia Meloni keeps managing a feat that her predecessors as Italian prime minister long struggled with: earning ever greater trust from investors.】

item.title: Calstrs 的支持使德国太阳能初创企业 1Komma5° 距离 IPO 更近了一步
item.description: 加利福尼亚州教师退休系统（California State Teachers' Retirement System）与其他几家美国和欧洲基金一起，正牵头为德国太阳能初创企业 1Komma5° 筹集 1.5 亿欧元（1.56 亿美元）的资金，使其更接近首次公开募股的目标。【原文：The California State Teachers’ Retirement System, along with several other US and European funds, is leading a €150 million ($156 million) financing round for German solar startup 1Komma5°, bringing it closer to a goal of holding an initial public offering.】

item.title: 屡遭骚扰指控后，SAP 晋升经理
item.description:
曾在科技巨头Signavio部门担任团队领导的女性表示，公司未能解决有关欺凌和歧视的投诉。SAP表示，公司对辱骂行为采取零容忍政策。【原文：

Women who worked for a team lead at the tech giant’s Signavio unit say that the company failed to address complaints of bullying and discrimination. SAP says it has a zero tolerance policy for abusive behavior. 

】

item.title: 以色列的多次战争催生了第一支由女教徒组成的战斗部队
item.description: 信教的女孩不属于战场。这是以色列大多数现代东正教团体的传统观点，年轻女性一般都会顺从这种观点。【原文：Religious girls don’t belong on the battlefield. That’s been the traditional view of most of Israel’s modern Orthodox community, and young women have generally gone along with it.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气贸易商惶惶不安，俄罗斯天然气流量问题愈演愈烈
item.description: 距离俄罗斯和乌克兰之间的过境协议到期还有不到两周的时间，欧洲天然气市场正准备迎接新年假期后的动荡交易。交易商们不会在 12 月 31 日狂欢，而是会刷新屏幕，查看头条新闻和电网数据，寻找最后一刻解决方案的线索。【原文：With less than two weeks left until a transit deal between Russia and Ukraine expires, Europe’s natural gas market is getting ready for turbulent trading after the New Year break. Instead of partying on Dec. 31, traders will be refreshing their screens to check headlines and grid data for clues on a last-minute solution — if there is one.】

item.title: 移除 Tether 使欧洲面临错失特朗普加密货币繁荣的风险
item.description: 即将在年底全面生效的欧盟加密资产法规已经在重塑一种重要的数字代币市场，这可能会削弱该集团对投资者的吸引力，而此时加密货币转换者唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）正准备在美国就职。【原文：European Union cryptoasset regulations set to take full force at year-end are already reshaping the market for a key type of digital token, potentially weakening the bloc’s appeal to investors just as crypto convert Donald Trump gets ready to take office in the US.】

item.title: 交易乐观、成本削减是欧洲电信业实现突破的关键
item.description: 在过去十年的大部分时间里，欧洲电信股一直处于低迷状态，终于在 2024 年迎来了转机。【原文：Having spent most of the past decade in the doldrums, European telecommunications stocks finally turned a corner in 2024, and many analysts predict that the sector can maintain its new-found strength in the year ahead.】

item.title: 据说中国的海信明年将考虑 5 亿美元在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，厦门锂电储能技术有限公司正在考虑最快于明年在香港进行首次公开募股。【原文：Xiamen Hithium Energy Storage Technology Co. is considering an initial public offering in Hong Kong as soon as next year, according to people familiar with the matter.】
